patterns: How many faculties are there at MMU
What is the number of faculties?
What faculties are there at your university?
how many faculties do you have?
responses: We have six faculties :1. Engineering 2. Media and Communication 3. Science and Technology 4. Business and Economics 5. Computing and Information Technology 6. Social Sciences
We have six faculties. Head on to our website https://www.mmu.ac.ke for more info

patterns: What courses are offered at MMU
Which courses are offered at MMU
Courses you offer at the university
responses: We offer a variety of courses in IT, Engineering,Media and Communication and business. Visit us at https://www.mmu.ac.ke for more info
Please head to our website www.mmu.ac.ke or visit us to get a copy of a bronchure with courses offered.

patterns: How much is the tuition fee
How much is your tuition fee
how much do you charge per semester
responses: Tuition fee ranges from 65,000-90,000 per semester for undergraduate courses, 200,000-250000 for master's degree and 40,000-69,000 for diploma courses
Contact us at 'info@mmu.ac.ke' to get detailed copy of fee structure

patterns: Does the university have student residences
does the university accomodation for students
responses: The school offers affordable on-campus hostels at the main campus
Students can reside at our hostels in the main campus
Accomodation is available on a first come basis

patterns: How long does undergraduate course take
how long does it take to complete undergraduate degree?
how long does it take to finish a degree
responses: Hi, Undergraduate engineering courses take 5 years while the rest take 4 years.

patterns: How long does a diploma course take
how long does it take to complete diploma course?
what is the duration of a diploma course
responses: Diploma courses take 3 years to complete

patterns: How long does a certificate course take
how long does it take to complete certificate course?
what is the duration of a certificate course
responses: Certficate courses take 1 year to complete
It takes one year to complete a certificte course

patterns: How many campuses do you have?
do you have a town campus
responses: We have two campuses, Our main campus and Town campus

patterns: Who are some of your notable employers?
responses: Our notable employers include Safaricom, Delloitte, Cellulant, SMG ,RMS and Kenya Power
Safaricom, Cellulant, Delloitte, SMG ,RMS ,Kenya Power are some of the notable employers to our students

patterns: How long does a semester last
responses: A semester takes 16 weeks to complete
A whole semester lasts about 4 months
